Class create_appointment_controller

java.lang.Object
Controller.create_appointment_controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class create_appointment_controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that provides control logic for the create appointment screen of the application.
Author:
Zachary Deacon
